name: Observer Path
description:
Drag Tiles onto the Board to make a path.
But careful; things don't always go how you expect.

  • Progress Forward with 'N'
  • Close Eyes by holding down 'C'
    (Open Eyes by releasing 'C')
  • Reset the Board with 'R'
  • Drag Tiles onto the Board with 'Left Mouse Button'
  • Remove Tiles from Board (before starting) with 'Right Mouse Button'
